answers.answer: i experience swollen feet & ankles as well but swollen hands i believe are a sign of preeclampsia....id talk to your dr!
Sounds like preeclampsia...I'd definitely call your dr soon!!
I would call your doctor and get checked out it could be a sign of preeclampsia?
I have an appointment next Tuesday so should I wait or call in and see of the can fit me in?? Sorry ladies, I really do feel dumb asking
and dontfeel dumb for asking here...our when you call the dr. office. that is what they are there for:)
Go to the dr and tell them. I had the same problem and I had developed something called 'HELP' .. Go get checked out cause it could be bad

question: My whole pregnancy I have had a little swelling in my hands, feet, lower legs and ankles.. Buut I've never had anything like this with ANY of my other pregnancies, jus a little swelling that comes and goes. This is now different n has gotten bad the passed couple days  I can no longer see where my ankles are, my feet are so swollen it hurts to walk on,them,or bend them. I've tried eating bananas, I don't add salt when cooking, tried to soak my handsand feet, even tried putting my feet up.. N nothing is any better :( any suggestions please?
title: swelling horribly, kinda starting to get concerned..
